pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, August 21, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Brockville, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford. A joint media availability will follow.

3M Canada
60 California Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.
  • Closed toe shoes and masks must be worn.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#
